mapper.select:
SELECT tradeaccoinfo.CUSTNO, tradeaccoinfo.FUNDCORPNO, tradeaccoinfo.LEVEL, tradeaccoinfo.BANKSERIALID, tradeaccoinfo.TRADEACCO, tradeaccoinfo.TRADEACCOST, tradeaccoinfo.OPENDT, tradeaccoinfo.UPDATETIME FROM tradeaccoinfo WHERE
tradeaccoinfo.CUSTNO = #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
tradeaccoinfo.FUNDCORPNO = #{fundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
tradeaccoinfo.LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
tradeaccoinfo.BANKSERIALID = #{bankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
1 = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tradeaccoinfo ( CUSTNO, FUNDCORPNO, LEVEL, BANKSERIALID, TRADEACCO, TRADEACCOST, OPENDT, ACKDATE, UPDATETIME ) values ( #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeacco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeaccost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opendt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ackdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select t.TRADEACCO, t.FUNDCORPNO, t.LEVEL, b.SERIALID, b.CUSTNO, b.BANKNO, b.BANKACCO, b.CERTTYPE, b.CERTNO, b.STATE, b.PROVINCE, b.CITY, b.SUBBANK, b.UPDATETIME from tradeaccoinfo t, bankcardinfo b where b.SERIALID = t.BANKSERIALID and t.TRADEACCOST = 'N' and b.STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.FUNDCORPNO = #{fundcorpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.CUSTNO = #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.BANKSERIALID = #{bankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
